thanks: Thanks for helping to bring a water well to those in need.
ask: This water well will provide clean drinking water for an entire community. The EverGreenCoin community was excited to fund its first Bangladesh well and we knew it is just the first of many. The 2nd in India proved this!  Please continue to help the EverGreenCoin community help other communities around the world.
thanksOnly: Thanks for helping to bring a water well to those in need.
